summary: Modding Skyrim: Scripter's Edition is the second in a series of extensive guides geared towards mod authors. It covers a variety of information to teach you how to script for Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][color=#6fa8dc]MODDING SKYRIM[/color]
[/size][size=3]Scripter's Edition[/size]

[color=#ff0000]Disclaimer:
[/color]This is a guide on the [i]creation[/i] of mods, [i]not[/i] the installation of mods. You can find plenty of those out there with a simple Nexus/Google search.

[size=2]This is [color=#6d9eeb]Modding Skyrim: Scripter's Edition (MS SE)[/color]. It is a guidebook on scripting in Skyrim. It covers everything from variables to events to states and SKSE scripting. MS SE is not necessarily meant to be read all the way through, given its length. Instead, it has an index so you can skip to topics applicable to you, or you can read the entire thing if you’re interested (which would be awesome, but I don't expect anyone to do it!).

[/size][i]It is intended for both new and old mod authors. [i]If there's something I said that is factually incorrect, [/i]please[i] tell me in the comments. [/i]Suggestions are welcomed from all - I want to make this as accurate and informative as possible. 
[/i]
[size=3]What It Includes

[/size]MS SE includes 7 parts, with many sections and subsections in each. There are 4 parts that are informative parts of the guide, and 3 others to help explain the guide, navigate, and credit. The file includes an index, which lists all parts, sections and subsections with hyperlinks to each. The parts are:

[b]Index[/b]
[b]Introduction[/b]
[b]Basic Script Writing
Advanced Script Writing
Debugging
Resources[/b]
[b]Credits[/b]

[size=3]File Format
[/size]
[size=2]The [b]MS SE[/b] [url=http://www.7-zip.org/download.html]7zip[/url] archive includes a .pdf. If you don't have a program to open either of those files, I recommend:

[/size][url=http://get.adobe.com/reader/]Adobe Reader[/url]

[size=3]Other Editions[/size]

[size=2]All editions in the 'Modding Skyrim' series:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54609/?]Modding Skyrim: Modder's Edition[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70883/?]Modding Skyrim: Scripter's Edition[/url]
[/size]
[size=3]Credits[/size]

[size=2]Thank you to my editors, Jac and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8345545/?]Simsim[/url].
Thanks to Bethesda for making Skyrim and providing modding tools.
Thanks to the entire community - without you, I would not have learned anything in the first place.

[/size][/center]
author: Mattiewagg
